title: Taos the Wizard Mouse
description: Taos is a mouse wizard with green eyes, who likes to solve different tasks using his magic knowledge. In the previous book, the bear, who gave the magic bean to Taos, asked in return for a favor. The mouse, now, returns to the bear to fulfill his promise. In the second book of Taos, near the magical vine, Our wizard made a promise to the bear Berendyne This is a graphical book and it is written in rhymes. It is a book that can be read on any hour, however, I recommend the bed night moment.
author: Evory Salieri
